name: Rushoar

aura.name: hard_head
aura.description: Can be ridden. Increases efficiency of destroying boulders while mounted.

description: Being extremely aggressive Pal, it often picks fights before gauging its opponent's strength. Though small, its powerful charge can even send boulders flying.

skills.name: reckless_charge
skills.description: Rushoar's special skill. Takes aim at a foe and rushes at them with a mad charge.

skills.name: sand_blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: power_shot
skills.description: Charges energy into a focused blast.

skills.name: stone_blast
skills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

skills.name: power_bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: rock_lance
skills.description: Generates a sharp rock spear under an enemy.

skills.name: pal_blast
skills.description: Charges destructive energy before firing a high-powered beam forward across a wide area.
